remarks: Sufficient conditions for the restriction of an involution to be a bijection (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Dec-2016.)
statement:
rinvbij.1 $e |- Fun F $.
rinvbij.2 $e |- `' F = F $.
rinvbij.3a $e |- ( F " A ) C_ B $.
rinvbij.3b $e |- ( F " B ) C_ A $.
rinvbij.4a $e |- A C_ dom F $.
rinvbij.4b $e |- B C_ dom F $.
rinvf1o $p |- ( F |` A ) : A -1-1-onto-> B $.
